content.question: A student prepares a lactic acid-sodium lactate buffer solution by mixing <math alttext="40 decimal point milliliters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>40.</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mL</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="0.50 molar H C 3 H 5 O 3 aqueous " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.50</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>HC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> with <math alttext="200 decimal point milliliters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>200.</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mL</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="1.0 molar N a C 3 H 5 O 3 aqueous" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>NaC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>. The <math alttext="p K sub a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>p</mtext><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="H C 3 H 5 O 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>HC</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> is 3.08. What is the <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of the resulting solution?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
